就是冲着伊丽莎白去的（滑稽），故事比较有深度，从哲学，宇宙学，物理学，伦理学等各个角度阐述了一个比较悲剧的故事，推荐！！

Воу, если Вы хотите, чтобы ваши разговоры с друзьями превратились в обсуждения и споры на счет сюжета видеоигры - то это то, что Вам нужно. Сюжет, который рождает теории (как в этой вселенной произошло то, а в той это  и т.п.), персонажи удивиельные, великолепно прописанные, со своим неповторимым характером! Однозначно стоящий сюжет. Не буду долго про это расписываться, оставлю эту конфетку для Вас. О геймплее без сюжета: игровой процесс приятен, картинка яркая, мир продуман до мелочей, механика шикарна. Играть одно удовольствие, процесс игры затягивает. Поверьте, перепройти ее потом тоже захочется, да и понимание сюжета при повторном прохождении будет более ясным.

Una historia cómo ninguna, uno de los mejores vídeo juegos de la historia.

Sí buscas un vídeo juego con temas de Física cuántica, filosofía, religión, teorías conspirativas y demás, esté es tu juego.

La verdad no quiero spoilear y lo dejo a tú criterio, dejare a continuación varios puntos que lo resumira:

Historia: 10/10

Jugabilidad : 10/10

Gráficos: 10/10

Duración: 10/10

Lagrimas: 10/10

Rejugabilidad 10/10

Total: 10

No tengo ya palabras para seguir describiéndolo, amo esta saga.

Nota: Hice este análisis cómo un fan por lo ya antes expuesto. :D
剧情跌宕起伏，出人意料，天空中的哥伦比亚真是美
The ending blows my mind. Spoiler free so I will just put this is one of the best ending for a game I've ever played, or maybe it's THE best ending for a game I've ever played.

An absolutely amazing game. Everything from the music to the gameplay to the story is exceptional. The story itself is my favorite part; hats off to the writers of this game.
一周目打完结局的我嘴里能塞一个苹果。。。。。迫不及待的开始了二周目，然后就有了现在的五周目。射击的手感不能说完美，但配上各种膜法简直爽翻天，1999难度下各种极限，需要熟练地切换，当然最重要的就是要靠伊丽莎白了。伊丽莎白应该算是我玩过的游戏里最棒的队友AI了，以至于到了被大鸟掳走的那一段读了几次档（让我想到了爱丽丝死的时候），总而言之，这是一款不玩绝对后悔的神作（虽然我安利其他人一次都没成功）

I'm not going to write to much so you will discover the game for yourself. This is more of an action adventure than first person shooter. It has good gameplay elements and a great story. What really sets this game apart from all the others is it's unique world and breathtaking art. There are few games that I would elevate to a work of art and this is one of those games.

10/10
This game is a masterpiece, however it's depressing once u get to the end.

"HISTORIA PERFECTA"
Sin duda alguna, mi juego favorito por excelencia a traves de todos los tiempos, asi pasen los años siempre volvere a jugar una y otra vez este gran juego, fue el juego que me introdujo a todo este mundo virtual, literalmente me enamoro (\(*w*)/)
Una historia que puede parecer confusa la primera vez que lo juegas, pero de eso se trata, que lo juegues mas de una vez para que le encuentres el sentido, perfecto para iniciar en el mundo de los videojuegos.
La definición perfecta para la palabra ARTE
M I N D B L O W N
为数不多的让我玩完印象深刻的游戏，最佳第九艺术

BioShock Infinite за короткое время полюбился всем и стал игровой классикой, которая не перестает быть актуальной и по сей день.
В игре есть абсолютно все: от отличных музыкальных элементов до глубокого сюжета, раскрывая который мы все больше привязываемся к персонажам. 
Прекрасно передана и атмосфера игры, выполненная в раскрытии социальных проблем 60-х годов США.
Тут есть и доля мистики, и доля консервативных моментов, возможность выбора и свобода действий.
Для многих эта игра стала каноном игровой индустрии, неперестающим удивлять.
一开始被哥伦比亚的绚烂弄得头晕目眩，画面太靓丽了。而后随着剧情推进，色调渐渐变得阴暗，隐藏在光鲜背景下的残酷社会现实也开始显现出来。剧情很不错，但是战斗系统的操作感比较一般。

Amazing game. It is just the best game without exception. From the story to the graphics, this is my all time favourite. The DLC was fantastic and brought tears to my eyes. I highly recomend this game.
神作的剧情，比情怀6不知高到哪里去

Fantastic mechanics and a compelling story.

This game is pretty good. I usually write a big long review for games but I can't for this one. It's just too hard to describe. The combat's not very good but the story is great. But I can't explain why. Just play it. So... yeah. This is a positive review. Buy it.

Its been a LONG time since I've played this game, but even nearly 4 years after I played it, I can't stop thinking about how amazing this game is. If you've played the previous Bioshock games and enjoyed it, or even if it put you off, I can't recommend ENOUGH that you forget everything you think you know about Bioshock, and give in to this title.

Bioshock Infinite is by far the most mind blowing game I've played in my life, and I've played hundreds (if not thousands) of games. It's beautiful, the story is so fun, the characters can grip you like nothing else (I found myself really wanting to protect Elizabeth with my life), and the twists and turns through the story will have you sitting back in your chair in disbelief at how deep this story goes.

If you haven't played this yet, you're missing out on the best gaming experience of your life. Do yourself a favour and play this game!
Greatest game I've ever played.
I think that if Ken "Jawmaster Supreme" Levine got in a fight with Todd "False Godd" Howard, Ken would win.
Pretty good story but the gameplay is meh. Good game by all means but not the masterpiece a lot consider it to be.
품바이오 쇼크 전 시리즈를 한데 묶어주는 최고의 작품

Strongly recommended!

Ce jeu est juste génial!  Le gameplay est super, l'hisoire est juste excellente et les graphisme sont vraiment beaux.  Le seul ponit faible est la durée de vie du jeu : seulement une douzaine d'heures.

Au final ce jeu fait partie des meilleurs jeu auqel j'ai pu jouer.

Wow!

I don't usually play role players with guns — Generally prefer medieval/fantasy settings instead, but I decided to take a chance on this one.  I had not played Bioshocks I&2, so I really wasn't sure I would like it.  Instead, I was amazed; I loved it.  It's the right mix of make-believe with reality with the perfect twist of philosophical creepiness.  It's one of the few RPG's I've played all the way through.  I highly recommend it.

Honestly, this game was amazing for multiple reasons. The art direction, the "wibbly wobbly timey wimey" maddness, the plot twist! The detail and beauty of the game, especially in how it ties back to the original Bioshock game blew my expectations out of the water. Wonderful!

Recomendar essa obra - [b]não é simplesmente um jogo[/b] - é um prazer imenso.
Arte fantástica, gráficos lindos, jogabilidade fluída - apesar dos controles diferentes da maioria dos [i]shooters[/i] - trama envolvente, personagens carismáticos, e história que te explode a cabeça.
Me faltam palavras para descrever essa maravilha.

This game has good story, gameplay, and it has a great ending! But the game lags often.
Great game

Awesome game, I'm sure you will be better to play the last with two DLC because it is the best as the final of Bioshock series. With regard to this world alone, this focuses racism with agony, the shady of American history and religious issue, but they are not points. This story is just a story on Elisabeth and Booker DeWitt, which is based on themes of Bioshock. That means it is an adventure with duddy-and-daughter bonds. Additionally their visuals are superior if the times go along somewhat because of unique artworks and the gameplay is a relatively simple for what dont disturb story-driven. I would appreciate the staff of this game sincerely.
Bioshock infinite amazed me with its storytelling and challenging gameplay. My first playthrough was memorable and exciting, and I enjoyed the depth to the combat.

Incrível!

Acredito que tive a sorte de jogar e zerar por primeira vez os três Bioshock, um após o outro. Foi uma experiência maravilhosa, como uma maratona de filmes que você assiste dias seguidos e não quer ver acabar.

Se o conceito do primeiro foi surpreendente e empolgante, o segundo continua igual de divertido porém sem inovar realmente. Agora, o terceiro é maravilhoso! Quase totalmente diferente de seus predecessores, a ação continua de praxe porém com uma história bem mais trabalhada, mesmo se às vezes acaba sendo muito complexa. No entanto, poderia ser um pouco mais macabro, seguindo o exemplo do segundo.

Quem sabe um quarto...? Com a condição que não estrague tudo!

Looks good, plays well.  Story seems pretty standard at first until everything goes all M. Knight Shyamalan on you.  Definitely worth the few quid it costs during all the sales.

Dieses Spiel ist für mich heute immer noch ein Glanz-Beispiel für eine fantastische Story... die mMn auch das auf Dauer einödende Gameplay allemal wett macht.

Die Atmosphäre ist großartig, und man wünscht sich manchmal, daraus wäre ein Story-orientiertes Spiel a la HeavyRain und Co geworden, denn man will einfach nicht genug haben, und die Kämpfe werden schon fast zum notwendigen Übel, um weiter in die Story eintauchen zu dürfen.

This game is the full package! Excellent graphics powered by the unreal engine 3 and some very good effects. A strong storyline that develops well and sucks you in. Smooth gameplay and controls thats easy to pickup. One of the best single player experiences that must be tried by everyone.
This game just blows your mind and fingers

Игра 10\10 на кончиках пальц.Концовка отличная(я плакаль).Также можно несколько раз передёрнуть на Элизабет.Отличная система перков(скиллов(эликсиров)).Стимпанковкая стилистика.Хочется проходить снова и снова и возращатся к игре. [spoiler] Элизабет-это твоя дочь и она убьёт тебя	[/spoiler]

The story and the graphics blew my mind. The artstyle and scenery make you want to stop running from that fireman thing that's chasing you just so that you can enjoy the view for a moment. The characters are well written, suspense is just right, and the famous plot twist is frustratingly good. All in all, it's a lot of fun.

10/10
LA VIE EN ROSE
one of the best

[b]Celá trilogie Bioshocku patří mezi mé nejoblíbenější herní série vůbec, první dva díly v podvodním Rapture byly fantastické, ale co nám přináší nejnovější infinite ? Zcela nové prostředí, překrásnou grafiku, nového herního parťáka (Elizabeth) a nové schopnosti. Je toho samozřejmě více, zcela nový příběh, časoprostorové anomálie atd. Začneme tedy hned odzačátku. Pokud vás již omrzelo podvodní Rapture, tak pro vás přináší Infinite zcela nový herní svět v podobě nebeského steampunk světa Columbia. Příběh je v tomto dílu o dost zamotanější než v prvních dvou dílech, je obtížnější ho pochopit, kvůli časoprostorovým anomáliím, do kterých vstupujete v průběhu hry. To je asi tak všechno co můžu říct, aniž bych to celé vyspoileroval. Tak si to tedy shrňme:

Klady:
           Nádherná grafika
           Nový herní svět
           Elizabeth
           Zbraňový arzenál

Zápory: Složitější příběh
              Krátší doba hraní než u předchozích dílů


Celkové hodnocení je tedy 8/10, za mě jedna z nejlepších her co jsem kdy hrál.[/b]
The Best Mind Blower! ;)
Incrivelmente bom, uma otima historia com reviravoltas, me surpriendi.
Top !
jeu tout simplement ENORME, tres beau graphise et une histoire qui claque ! je recomande
